column1: With COVID-19 on the rise we should provide monthly direct cash payments of $2000/month for at least the next 6 months to keep families afloat.  It’s common-sense policy that will save lives.

Given COVID's impact on our economy it has never been more important to pass transformative solutions to the #HousingCrisis. My plan would address public housing homelessness renter relief equitable home ownership and fair housing policies. Learn more:https://t.co/BEf9ibXoZy

Hope Trump's team of doctors includes a chiropractor to treat the whiplash from his incoherent and erratic decision making.  COVID relief might be a game to Trump and his fellow Republicans but it isn't to the millions of American workers and small businesses that need help NOW.
While Trump gets free world-class COVID-19 treatment in his ivory tower he just rejected bipartisan #stimulus relief efforts for the rest of the country. Here’s what this means for you:

Like millions of Americans with COVID-19 Trump now has another pre-existing condition.  If he is successful in overturning the Affordable Care Act in court all of those people could be denied health insurance.  The Trump admin must drop their lawsuit NOW. #ProtectOurCare

Whether you've evacuated or simply need a place to escape poor air quality please know that the @RedCross Shelter at the Oregon Convention Center is open to ALL. There's plenty of space to social distance medical care good food and helpful volunteers from across the country. https://t.co/9bv7gY0Lo8

Air quality conditions in Oregon are especially dangerous in the face of the pandemic. Stay informed:  ▶️ CDC info on wildfire smoke and COVID-19: https://t.co/EKwmX966xJ  ▶️ Local air quality info: https://t.co/FF0YENmiAP  ▶️ Oregon Health Authority info: https://t.co/xTzK8N0s34

Another telling example of empty boasting stunning incompetence & cruelty as @realdonaldtrump threatens to deny badly needed resources to cities hit hard by COVID-19. Rather than working to reduce tensions he makes situations worse when he's unable to lead or solve problems.
Absent from the RNC: ❎Masks ❎Social distancing ❎A plan to defeat COVID-19  Present at the RNC: ☑️Racism ☑️Bigotry  ☑️Lies  We can't afford four more years of Donald Trump.

Just like with COVID Republicans on the House floor are arguing that Trump's sabotage of our mail system is a hoax.   Tell that to the 500+ Oregonians who've told me harrowing stories about how mail delays have already created serious problems in their lives.  #SaveThePostOffice

You've got to ask yourself what planet Republicans live on as they continue to block more COVID relief.  Don’t they hear constituents' fears? Don’t they get the economic trauma? How can they ignore the most urgent set of interrelated crises in our history?  People need help NOW!

Trump wants you to think more COVID testing is unnecessary while he is tested daily.  Trump wants you to think #VoteByMail is fraudulent while he does it often.  Trump wants your kid to go back to school while his kid's school stays closed.  We must vote this fraud out of office!

Disgraceful. Trump thinks the staggering coronavirus death toll in the United States "is what it is".  Tell that to the hundreds of Oregonians who have lost loved ones in part because of the administration's refusal to take this pandemic seriously. https://t.co/jlxu2XZR0a
The growing number of COVID-19 cases in our nation’s jails is a human rights crisis. We must take steps NOW to reduce jail populations. Countless lives are at stake. https://t.co/f7l1XlJVgG

It's unfathomable that @SenateGOP has allowed $600/week in unemployment insurance to expire.  Millions of Americans are still unemployed because of Trump's disastrous COVID-19 response.  The Senate must join the House in extending this important lifeline. https://t.co/Ytk1DPI6pm

The restaurants that make our communities unique have been hit the hardest by #COVID19.  My plan would give immediate relief to local independent restaurants so they can stay afloat and keep our communities whole. Read about it here ⬇️ https://t.co/fHBfBj2dw4

Join @SMeieran @SenBurdick and me at 11 AM for a #COVID19 virtual town hall.  We’re going to discuss the work we’re doing at the federal state and local levels to beat this and come back stronger than ever.   Watch here: https://t.co/sDw3CBFpyZ https://t.co/dmoCYD71ls

While we fight the #COVID19 crisis we should begin thinking about the ultimate crisis of our climate & its most devastating impacts.   On the 50th Anniversary of #EarthDay let's commit to having the bold vision of a healthy planet & a healthy economy. https://t.co/bw5rgy6HCN

The U.S. today has effectively given death sentences to hundreds of thousands of non-violent drug offenders trapped in COVID-19 hotspots in our prisons.   This 4/20 let's commit to staying the course & reforming our harmful cannabis policies. https://t.co/0dt4E2BSTs

We need a “time out” on rent mortgage and commercial leases. I'm fighting for this and more in the next #COVID19 relief package.   These are troubling times. We need bold action that will make a difference for the challenges people are facing right now.

Using technology our COVID-19 Resource Guide and our campaign infrastructure we held our first volunteer training today to reach out to at-risk community members to check in with them and connect them to the resources they need. https://t.co/DFHSULy8sI
Americans need a coordinated whole-of-government response to provide healthcare and economic security during the #COVID19 pandemic.

Gracias a todos nuestros trabajadores de primera línea y a los que han apoyando a sus amigos familias y vecinos durante este tiempo difícil. Mi equipo y yo hemos actualizado nuestra Guía de Recursos COVID-19 y hemos agregado una sección en español que seguiremos agregando a.

Thank you to all our frontline workers and to those supporting their friends families and neighbors during this challenging time. My team and I have updated our COVID-19 Resources Guide & added a section in Spanish which we will continue to add to. https://t.co/5j8VtRHc10

I worked w/ @RepDelBene @cathymcmorris & other #PNW members to urge the Trump admin to address the growing demand of ventilators in our region which we severely lack.   We have been hit hard by #COVID19. We must provide front line physicians w/ resources to keep people safe. https://t.co/eoZPsjM0U3

States are rightly delaying in-person voting but we shouldn't have to choose between public health and participating in our democracy.   That's why I'm fighting alongside @RonWyden to allow for mail-in voting during public health crises like #COVID19

This country is entering one of the most tumultuous economic periods in our history. While we must prioritize public health I'm working on a plan to help workers and local businesses fight back against the economic damage being done by #COVID19
These Oregon-based physicians have a plan to mitigate the spread and consequences of #COVID19. I hope this administration will listen and take action.  https://t.co/CPWNDyMHXi

-For those unemployed as a result of #COVID19 I’m working to secure benefits that would be available through the end of 2020 and can be paid retroactively. Importantly Social Security trust funds must be held harmless. 9/15
-Halt student debt collections and provide relief while we deal with economic challenges brought on by #COVID19. 6/15
-A moratorium on evictions that could result from #COVID19. 5/15
This is what we need:   -Free #COVID19 testing for everyone who needs a test including the uninsured regardless of income. 3/15

With all of the uncertainty surrounding #COVID19 I want to make sure you know what I’m fighting for in Washington D.C.   There are some lessons I hope we have learned from other crises of the last two decades like 9/11 and the 2008 financial crisis. 1/15

#Covid_19 testing should be free.  Paid family and medical leave should be guaranteed.   In the midst of a global health crisis this should be common sense and it will make a huge difference stabilizing the economy.

Enjoyed having lunch w/ members of the PDX Chinese American community to discuss ways we can fight racial discrimination amidst the #COVID19   outbreak. With all the disinformation circulating it's important to continue patronizing AAPI businesses & keep our local economy strong https://t.co/vnuivXl25d

Yesterday I worked alongside others in the delegation to secure CDC funding to help fight the coronavirus in Oregon. The House and Senate also passed a funding package double what the Trump administration proposed to fight the virus nationwide.

Despite what @realdonaldtrump says #coronavid19 is not a hoax. @OHAOregon recommends that you wash your hands often w/soap & water for 20 sec cover coughs & sneezes w/a tissue avoid touching your face clean & disinfect surfaces & stay home if you are sick. For info call 211. https://t.co/IUKEBXzlEA

Trump has dismissed the severity of the coronavirus cut budgets that would fund the response & passed the responsibility to a man who has a track record of failed public health leadership.   Now we hear stories of people being billed for care to keep the virus at bay.
